title.narrative: Congo: Forest and Econ. Diversification Project

description.narrative: To increase the capacity of the forest administration, local communities, and indigenous peoples to co-manage forests.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Article V, 5.01 (c) | Description :CFA Franc 500 million to be deposited in the Project Counterpart FundsAccount, to be used exclusively for project expenditures | Due Date :11-Oct-2012

Finance Agreement :Article IV, 4.01 (a) | Description :The WB determines that the Recipient has failed to apply soundenvironmental or social standards or practices in its management ofnatural forests and plantations or carrying out natural forestor plantation related activities. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Article IV, 4.01 (b) | Description :The WB determines that the forestry Legislation has been amended, suspended,abrogated, repealed or waived in such manner as to affect materially and adversely the ability of the Recipient to perform any ofits obligations under the Financing Agreement or to achieve the Project's objective. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Article V, 5.01 (a) | Description :Appointment to the Directorate of Studies and Planning for project purposesof an administrative, financial management and accounting specialist, procurement specialist, expert in natural resourcesmanagement with M&E experience and social scientist with communication experience, each with qualifications, experience and TORsacceptable to the World Bank | Due Date :11-Oct-2012
Finance Agreement :Article V, 5.01 (b) | Description :Adoption of Project Implementation Manuel approved by the World Bank | DueDate :11-Oct-2012

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section III.B.4 (a) | Description :Engagement of acceptable external auditors (mentionedinadvertently in the legal covenant related to accounting software) | Due Date :31-Jan-2014
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section III.B.4 (a) | Description :Installation of a suitable accounting software; and engagement ofacceptable external auditors | Due Date :11-Jan-2013

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section III.B.4 (a) | Description :TORs for all studies and TA under the Project to comply with andpay due attention to Safeguard Frameworks and to the Recipient's laws on environmental and social aspects | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, section I.D. Annual Work Plan | Description :Annual work plans for the project to be prepared bythe recipient and furnished to the World Bank for Approval, and to include all safegaurds instruments required pursuant to theSafeguard Frameworks for the activities proposed to be included in the annual workplan | Frequency :Yearly
The Recipient shall, not later than three (3) months after the Project's Effective Date, revise and update, in accordance withterms of reference acceptable to the World Bank, the Project manual.
